'''Norman Forsey''' (b. [[3 January|January 3]], [[1937]]) is a New Zealand actor born in Cardiff, Wales. He played [[Gaffer Gamgee|Hamfast Gamgee]] in ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring]]''. He only appeared in the [[The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring (extended edition)|extended edition]].
